name: Code Adventures
description:
You play as Kyube. He is an exploration fanatic. He had recently heard of an old castle and decided to check it out.

Tutorials on how to play will provided in the game as you play

The levels get progressively harder. So Good Luck

(If you find any bugs in the game, please let me know)

  • Music - Chrome Music Lab
  • Art - Paint.NET

Thank You
